# Question 1

In an experiment, between group variation is ONLY due to the group structure (i.e., being in differet conditions)?

# Question 2

In the logic of the ANOVA a ratio of between group variation to within group variation that is equal to 1 suggest... 

a. There isn't an effect of the group structure. 
b. There is an effect of the group structure. 
c. There is not any random variation. 
d. None of the above.

# Answers
1. False
2. a
